name: The Price of Food
description: Today, I present to you... An innovative Role Played Game, where you have control over everyone... but the main character. Developed in 14 days while featuring: A story where every choice matters, that couldn't exist without the help of the Ice Queen. Stunning art drawn by Alaka Zombozoo. Its own unique RPG engine. Open sourced. Blame AzCraft for that. We currently have only the prologue finished. We hope to work together with our audience to create an entertaining story with a lot of variety. Once we're done with exams and boring stuff.
